The Enigmatic Threshold: Cannot equip the following items: Experimental Hexplate, Fimbulwinter, Nashor\'s Tooth, Frozen Heart, Heartsteel
The Lost Portal: Cannot equip the following items: Liandry\'s Torment, Trailblazer, Lord Dominik\'s Regards, Dawncore, Sterak\'s Gage
The Faded Gateway: Cannot equip the following items: Horizon Focus, Blackfire Torch, Spear of Shojin, Umbral Glaive, Experimental Hexplate
The Ghosted Passageway: Cannot use the Domination rune path
The Secret Vault: Limited to the following roles: Top Lane, Support, Mid Lane
The Unmarked Vault: Cannot use the Precision rune path
The Secret Archway: Cannot equip the following items: Essence Reaver, Bloodthirster, Manamune, Statikk Shiv, Voltaic Cyclosword
The Cryptic Vault: Limited to the following roles: Top Lane, Jungler, Mid Lane
